h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
content: After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, you'll be able to leave the enchanted seed sack and continue your pursuit of Yellowbrow, but not in the way you might expect.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief' and the sub-subsection 'Final Encounter - Mahavira Hall'.
The content is as follows:
After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, you'll be able to leave the enchanted seed sack and continue your pursuit of Yellowbrow, but not in the way you might expect.
